# armis_report (Resource)

Provides an Armis report resource.

The resource provisions a report in Armis with support for ASQ queries, scheduling, and export configurations.
Note: Reports cannot be updated in-place. Any changes will force recreation of the resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `asq` (String) The Armis Standard Query (ASQ) for the report. Example: 'in:devices timeFrame:"1 Day"'
- `report_name` (String) The name of the report.

### Optional

- `email_subject` (String) The email subject for scheduled report notifications.
- `export_configuration` (Attributes) Export configuration for the report columns. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--export_configuration))
- `schedule` (Attributes) Schedule configuration for the report. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--schedule))

### Read-Only

- `creation_time` (String) The timestamp when the report was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the report.
- `is_scheduled` (Boolean) Whether the report has a schedule configured.
- `report_type` (String) The type of the report (computed from the API response).

<a id="nestedatt--export_configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `export_configuration`

Optional:

- `columns` (Attributes) Column configuration for different report types. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--export_configuration--columns))

<a id="nestedatt--export_configuration--columns"></a>
### Nested Schema for `export_configuration.columns`

Optional:

- `activities` (List of String) List of activity columns to include in the export.
- `devices` (List of String) List of device columns to include in the export.
- `vulnerabilities` (List of String) List of vulnerability columns to include in the export.



<a id="nestedatt--schedule"></a>
### Nested Schema for `schedule`

Optional:

- `email` (List of String) List of email addresses to receive the scheduled report.
- `repeat_amount` (String) The interval amount for report scheduling (e.g., '1', '2', '0.5').
- `repeat_unit` (String) The interval unit for report scheduling (e.g., 'Days', 'Weeks', 'Months').
- `report_file_format` (String) The file format for the exported report (e.g., 'csv', 'xlsx', 'pdf').
- `time_of_day` (String) The time of day to run the scheduled report (e.g., '15:00').
- `timezone` (String) The timezone for the scheduled report (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'UTC').
- `weekdays` (List of String) List of weekdays to run the report (e.g., 'Monday', 'Tuesday').
